title: Big Tech And The Great Reset (Ep 1735)
description:
What is big tech’s role in the “Great Reset”? Why are they pushing for more cooperation with the swamp? In this episode, I address the issue along with new developments in the Hunter Biden scandal. 

News Picks:


Biden had to use a cheat sheet to remember what to say about his Putin comments.

You think the inflation crisis is bad now? Watch it explode if Biden’s budget passes.


This Google billionaire has unprecedented access to our science bureaucracy.

“Fact-checkers” are a disgrace to humanity. They’re an embarrassing mess of morons. Here’s additional proof.


Are we headed for nuclear war?
